name: Simply Login Register
author: Soham Web Solution

sections.description: Simply Login Regiser is a easy way to create login and register page by usring short code. for create login page use [slr_login] shortcode and for register page add [slr_register] code on page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload category-post-slider.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip simply-login-register.zip
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  4. You will find \’simply login register settings\’ under setting menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Version 2.1 – December 25, 2023
  • Inhancement: Enable support upto wordpress 6.4.2

2.0

  • Version 2.0
  • Issue: Fixed bugs
  • Inhancement: Make proper working on wordpress 4.9.4

1.0

  • Version 1.0
  • Initial version.

short_description: Easy way to create login and register page by shortcode. It\'s very simply to use this  plugin.
